籤詩版本二:
Ngikweluleka ukuthi ungaceli kuye usizo, undiza njengenkengane futhi udubula imicibisholo eyimfihlo kuwe.
Uma uyotheza izinkuni kukhona inyoka otshanini ungalunywa ushevu udabuke.
詩意:
Le hexagram iwuphawu lokuhlala uphephile futhi uzigcine.
Qaphela kukho konke.
解曰: Vala umlomo wakho ubambe amazinyo. Akanaki. Uma uzizwa unecala. Ekugcineni kuzilimaza.
籤詩故事一:
◇ Umhlangano we-chessboard
Umbusi u-Taizong Wobukhosi Bama-Tang wayemasha eya entshonalanga futhi wayevaleleke eDolobheni lase-Suoyang. U-Cheng Yaojin wabuyela e-Beijing ukuze acele ukuqiniswa.
U-Xue Dingshan wayalwa ukuthi asebenze njenge-Second Route Marshal futhi wahamba ukuyohlenga iNkosi futhi axolise u-Xiliao.
Ngemva kokuba iqembu labantu liphuma eYumen Pass, lafika eNtabeni iQipan. Evinjezelwe yizinkulungwane zamanxusa entabeni, u-Dou Yihu, inkosi yentaba, wahlulwa ujenene u-Tang uLuo Tong. Ngenhlanhla, udadewabo u-Dou Xiantong wayengumfundi kaMama Ongcwele Wezimbali Eziphuzi futhi enekhono kwezobuciko bokulwa. wabamba intambo yezinganekwane wabopha uLuo Tong.
(Inkondlo esayiniwe ihambisana nalokhu)
U-Dou Xiantong wabona ubuhle buka-Xue Dingshan futhi wafuna ukuba umngane ka-Feng Luan, kodwa u-Xue Dingshan wenqaba. U-Dou Xiantong wathukuthela wafuna ukumkhipha wamnquma ikhanda. Ngenhlanhla, u-Cheng Yaojin weza ukuzomhlenga futhi waqhuba umshado wabo. Kamuva, u-Dou Yihu wabuye wahola abazalwane bakwaQipanshan babuyela eBukhosini BamaTang ukuze basize uMbuso WamaTang unqobe iWestern Liao.
聖意: Ukuvikeleka kwasekhaya, ukuzithakasela, ukufuna ingcebo, ukulinda ibhizinisi, umshado ongavunyelwe, i-alamu engamanga ye-Liujia, abahamba ngezinyawo abavimbe amasimu, iminyundu, imfuyo eyisithupha, abantu abalahlekile, ukuvimba amacala omphakathi, ukulahlekelwa (Mo Xing) Ukufuduka, ukonga, ukulahleka kwempahla, isifo kunzima ukululama, ithuna entabeni, inhlanhla
